Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, east of the Dentra Archery Range.
Room.LongDescription: The Dentra Archery Range is divided into two separate ranges, one for the advanced archers and another for beginners and novice archers. The Range improves archery skills and often holds tournaments to see who can hit the target's bull's eye from the furthest distance. The entrance to the facility is located off of Waterfront Way.
